thread.title: BRIEF-Onex And Vista Equity Partners To Become Equal Partners In Powerschool

title: BRIEF-Onex And Vista Equity Partners To Become Equal Partners In Powerschool

organizations.name: vista equity partners to become equ
vista equity partners to become equal partners in powerschool

text:
April 16, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Onex And Vista Equity Partners To Become Equal Partners In Powerschool Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Onex Corp: 
* ONEX AND VISTA EQUITY PARTNERS TO BECOME EQUAL PARTNERS IN POWERSCHOOL, BACKING EDTECH LEADER’S VISION FOR THE FUTURE OF K-12 EDUCATION 
* ONEX CORP - TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED 
* ONEX CORP - CONCURRENT WITH ONEX/VISTA TRANSACTION, POWERSCHOOL WILL ACQUIRE PEOPLEADMIN 
* ONEX CORP - ONEX’ PORTION OF INVESTMENT WILL BE MADE BY ONEX PARTNERS IV Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
